category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_print_white_vectors_in_black
preference.preference_description: Indicates whether to print the white vectors in auxiliary drawing files (.pdf, .tif, .jpg, .ps) in white or in black. For Pdf format support, Pdf Creator software is required for Operating Systems less than Windows 10, for Windows 10, Print to Pdf is used. Possible values: - TRUE = In black color - FALSE = In white color
